text: ACE with another banger from an amazing soundtrack. Which reminds me that I really want to play Xenoblade 2 this year. I often end up clearing some of my huge backlog during the first half of the year, and then playing current year games during the second half. It's been working pretty well.
author: SupraDarky

text: Damn, now that I know ACE is behind this game's ost, I'll have to check it out. I adore their work in Xenoblade Chronicles 1 and 2.
